title: 81/670/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Ortec economy energy dispersive system, model 5200 M', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 23 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Ortec economy energy dispersive system, model 5200 M", may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/670/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Ortec economy energy dispersive system, model 5200 M", which is the subject of an application by Germany of 28 January 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
